question: Q1) Is it permissible for women to go womens only swimming classes with the satar covered,with other muslim and non muslim women?
answer:
QUESTION

Q1) Is it permissible for women to go womens only swimming classes with the satar covered,with other muslim and non muslim women?
Q2) Are there any conditions for women to attend womens only swimming classes?

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

 

It is permissible for women to attend women’s-only swimming classes with other Muslim or non-Muslim women if:

They properly cover their ‘awrah
Their clothing is appropriate and not revealing, especially after becoming wet
No non-mahram man is able to see them, including any male lifeguards or security personnel
They can safeguard their gazes from looking at the ‘awrah of other women, in case of them not covering properly
There is no fear of other women describing the Muslim women’s body, face, or hair to other non-mahram men
The environment is free from other harms and evils, such as music

 

يجوز أن ينظر الرجل إلى الرجل إلى جميع جسده إلا إلى عورته وعورته ما بين سرته حتى يجاوز ركبته...نظر المرأة إلى المرأة كنظر الرجل إلى الرجل

(المحيط البرهاني، كتاب الكراهية والاستحسان، الفصل التاسع: 8/24-25؛ إدارة)

And Allah knows best

Wassalaamu `alaykum

Ml. Abrar Mirza,
